description:
Made specifically to fit a women's foot snugly, these amphibious sandals combine comfort and performance with some graceful, feminine style.

  • Uppers feature neoprene foam and LYCRA® strap linings for next-to-skin comfort
  • Hook-and-loop strap closures and two adjustable forefoot closures provide a secure, comfortable fit
  • Midsoles are compression-moulded EVA with encapsulated heel shock pads, zinc-based Micro-ban anti-microbial treatment, and moulded nylon stability shanks
  • Outsoles are non-marking Spider Rubber®, for good grip wet or dry
name: Teva Tirra Sandals - Women's
